discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -0,0 +1,5 @@
+---
+"create-cloudflare": patch
+---
+
+fix: support GitHub URL with subdirectory
discussion_comments.comment_body:
```suggestion
fix: support GitHub URL with subdirectory

You can now copy+paste the URL directly from your address bar when you find a template within a (mono)repo on github.com.
```

commented_code:
+---
+"wrangler": minor
+---
+
+feat: add new `--env-interface` to `wrangler types`
+
+Add the possibility for users to specify the "env" interface name
+they want `wrangler types` to generate, via the new CLI flag `env-interface`

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+---
+"wrangler": minor
+---
+
+feat: add new `--env-interface` to `wrangler types`
+
+Add the possibility for users to specify the "env" interface name
+they want `wrangler types` to generate, via the new CLI flag `env-interface`
discussion_comments.comment_body:
```suggestion
Allow users to specify the name of the interface that they want `wrangler types` to generate for the `env` parameter, via the new CLI flag `--env-interface`
```

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+---
+"wrangler": minor
+---
+
+feat: add new `--env-interface` to `wrangler types`
+
+Add the possibility for users to specify the "env" interface name
+they want `wrangler types` to generate, via the new CLI flag `env-interface`
discussion_comments.comment_body: Might be worth reminding readers that without this flag it defaults to `Env`.
